main event: A single silver/metallic green object, about 2-3 inches across, was observed descending behind a tree line in Fairplay, Colorado on April 24, 1967.
interesting points: The object moved and then descended straight down, appearing to be landing.
The object was visible for a total of about 3 minutes, first seen at 13-20 degrees above the horizon and then descending below the tree line.
No sound was associated with the object.
The witness stopped their car to observe the object.
The report was forwarded to the military, but no further details were provided about any investigation or conclusions.
